action.content: Turn 0

You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

Your goal for this game is: Put the broom on the shelf, the potted plant on the counter and the plate in the wardrobe.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch, a chair and a book. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a hallway, a kitchen and a bedroom here.

> take book from side table

> go to kitchen

> take potted plant from counter

> go to bedroom

> put potted plant on counter

> go to hallway

> take broom from floor

> go to bedroom

> put broom on shelf

> go to kitchen

> take plate from counter

> go to bedroom

> put plate in wardrobe

> done<|im_end|>
